participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Creative and enthusiastic, always eager to explore new ideas and share knowledge.
participant_1.background: I am driven and tenacious, and I will not stop until I achieve my goals. My weight is not relevant to this question. I have two chihuahuas. I currently hold three jobs. I am going to school for writing.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, often reflecting on life choices and future paths.
participant_2.background: I miss my dog every day. I need to find a way to advertise my juicing bar to people in my neighborhood. I wear glasses all day. I'm still trying to figure out what I want to do with my life. My school life is going well, though I am a bit tired from working so many hours at the food pantry.

content.text: Hello, what are you up to today?
Hello, not much just finished working at the food pantry and I'm getting ready to go to school.
Oh cool, I'm actually going to school for writing.
Oh that's awesome, what kind of writing are you interested in?
I'm interested in all sorts of writing, but I'm mainly focused on creative writing at the moment.
That's really cool, I've always wanted to be a writer but I don't know where to start.
Well, if you ever want to talk about it, I'd be happy to help.
Thanks, I might take you up on that.
No problem, what do you do for work?
I work at a juicing bar in my neighborhood and I'm trying to figure out how to advertise it more.
Oh cool, I've never been to a juicing bar before.
You should come by sometime, I'll give you a free juice.
Thanks for the offer, I might just take you up on that.
Sounds good, I'm free most days.
